snippet: The people passing by, the noises of the street and even the weather influence the events of “The Love Letter You’ve Been Meaning to Write New York.”
lead_paragraph: The people passing by, the noises of the street and even the weather influence the events of “The Love Letter You’ve Been Meaning to Write New York.”
